p: In total, 2,044 DEGs were identified in NV vs. NDH, NV vs. NDV, and NDV vs. NDH comparisons ( Fig 3A). Among these, 251, 420, and 149 DEGs were uniquely expressed in NDV vs. NDH, NV vs. NDH, and NV vs. NDV samples, respectively, and 116 DEGs were commonly expressed in these comparisons ( Fig 3B).
